https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tTgUxnSePh7dM3Avyhe5jNnkT5q.jpg Companion is a short stop-motion film that expresses the friendship between a dog and a human. The story follows a dog's life and the interactions he has with his owner and other animals along the way. Companion
